qas.question: What is New Delhi's rank in Mercer's 2015 quality of living survey?
What is the main cause of New Delhi's relatively low ranking in Mercer's quality of life survey?
New Delhi was ranked as the world's worst polluted city by what organization?
How many cities were tracked for pollution by the World Health Organization in 2014?
How many cities were studied in Mercer's 2015 quality of living survey?

context: In recent Mercer’s 2015 annual quality-of-living survey, New Delhi ranks at number <a0_0>154<a0_0/> out of <a4_0>230<a4_0/> cities due to <a1_0>bad air quality and pollution<a1_0/>. <a2_0>The World Health Organization<a2_0/> ranked New Delhi as the world’s worst polluted city in 2014 among about <a3_0>1,600<a3_0/> cities the organization tracked around the world.
